DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate bioequivalence clinical tablet formulation ( 100 mg x 5 ) clinical capsule formulation ( 100 mg x 5 ) healthy subject feed condition ( Cohort 1 ) investigate effect high-fat meal pharmacokinetics bosutinib administration propose commercial tablet formulation ( 100 mg x 4 ) healthy subject ( Cohort 2 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence And Food Effect Study Of Bosutinib In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female non childbearing potential subject age 21 55 year , inclusive . Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12 Lead ECG clinical laboratory test . Pregnant nursing woman woman childbearing potential .
